tweets.text:
Over the course of the next days, many of our MIOS members will present their ongoing research at the virtual @icahdq conference #ICA21. For an overview, visit: https://t.co/SzgsYDOhHV
Best of luck! https://t.co/NLXpVPvbXi

Friends at #ICA21: If you want to learn about the awesome chapters by @candiscallison, Duangkaew Dhiensawadkij, & Suzana Magalhães a part of our forthcoming book I co-edited w/ @hbodker, check-out our @Journalism_ICA panel, Climate Change and Journalism: Negotiating Rifts of Time https://t.co/K3ACYgE2HI

Check out the #ica21 panel “I Forgot to Remember to Forget: Unmasking Mediated History” #ica_history is featuring
-- “A History of White (Re)Mediation of the Black Voice: Racism and Empowerment in the Journey of “Ain’t I a Woman?” @AronisCarolin @Nat_Shri

So proud of @MurrowCollege Ph.D. students @leticiacouto96 & Soojung Kim. They presented our research "Adherence to Sexual Stereotypes and Sex-Related Alcohol Expectancies: Explaining Young Women's Sexting During the Coronavirus Pandemic" at #ICA21. #MurrowInAction #MurrowMinds https://t.co/0lrIVBRhkZ

tweets.text: Up for LIVE #ica21 interaction? Join our Watch Party "Journalism & Mobile News" @Journalism_ICA Saturday May 29, 5 pm CET. We'll be discussing news on Telegram, WhatsApp & politics of mobility. DM me for link @henrikornebring @digitalamysw @akiba_cohen @Ahmedkhalid75 @AnaSerranoT

Congrats Chantel Haughton and Tammy Afifi on this excellent top paper: Resilience in Interracial Relationships: Relationship Maintenance and Communal Orientation as Protection Against Network Stigma #ica21 #ica_ipc #resilience #commresearch @CommUcsb #relationships https://t.co/CQEJUZZXrU
👉Networking Hate: An Exploratory Network Analysis of the U.S. Far-Right Digital Landscape by Carissa Goodwin, @YVeilleuxLepage, @DrorWalter, Ayse Lokmanoglu, and @MeredithPruden

Day 2 #ICA21 join us for #ICAPopular round table on the global dimensions of social media entertainment & Wanghong w/@producing2Power, @SDCunningham, @artarriagada, @thesangeetkumar, @antlinjian, @arbitist, @HectorPostigo, @aswinp, @cscolari @elainezj
And make sure you check out @producing2Power & @SDCunningham book Creator Culture, discussed in this round table! #ICApopular @ICAPopular #ICA21  https://t.co/MaNZoMTWOq

How foreign countries are covered in the US: @DrorWalter, @MeredithPruden
@ophiryota, @GuyGolan used ANTMN (https://t.co/7xV42b5QPb) to create topic networks and explored how frames relate to a country's GDP, military expenditure, trade, geographic & cultural proximity. #ICA21 https://t.co/DUO5YMXUyq
Excited to learn from and brainstorm with @tldelrosso! #ica21 https://t.co/8f1lGkmtHL
@JannieHart @DataPublic @roskildeuni @Lindskow Sorry to miss it. Say hi to people from me.

Meep. I missed the deadline to upload our team's #ICA21 #ica_hc talk on COVID-19 messaging and reactance😳. Posting it here: https://t.co/CXRbTL7Hff Despite my delinquency, I'm enjoying this awesome conference platform and the loads of great scholarship this year!

tweets.text: At #ica21 @ica_pd has an amazing range of great papers! Check this collection of recorded case studies in global #diplomacy. Very valuable insights! Among them also the Top Faculty Paper of @phil_arceneaux and Top Student Paper of @ZhaoAlexHuang. Check them out! https://t.co/ZXid3Jtq0W

We are participating at the current virtual #ICA21 with two contributions both presented from @na_loe_ - We make sure to share some important knowledge regarding the framework 'Communication, Connectedness, and Social Justice' 🙂 https://t.co/LFAV4hL0MX

If you're at #ICA21 come check our panel, "Regulation, Policy and Governance: Unpacking Keywords in Digital Communications Policy," with Terry Flew, @aslama, @pmnapoli, and @PRSchlesinger1  
https://t.co/2KKT7L1kzq
@celestegdb is setting the stage for how @CAJUArizona and @UCWArizona came to be. This is not easy work in a right to work state. #ica21
Looking for a reminder of the SCIG #ICA21 sessions all in one place? Well, look no further! #ICASCIG2021 https://t.co/1dz4sCrGgE

Narratives of Race: At the Interface of Black Stories and Whiteness Discourses teaches us about White women influencers control of wellness, entertainment working as self-care, white protests for Black lives, and racial storytelling in advertising. #ICA21

tweets.text: Doc student @ChauFox33 presents our work at the intersection of #gamestudies and #hmc #hri at this year's online #ICA21. He's on the job market starting this fall, folks. A good egg, this one. =) https://t.co/u76KWdUJvO

Big compliment to the #ICA21 organizers. Yes, I miss seeing people in person too (*** a lot ***) or discovering a new city. But... the online conference platform works impressively well! Already enjoyed my first hours and am looking forward to see much more!

What a panel! Excited to have teamed up with @couldrynick and João Magalhães @hiig_berlin to share our work on digital personal assistants and the colonization of the home! #ICA21 ✨ https://t.co/pWaoEaXEEk
Welcome to the 71st Annual ICA Conference from the Theme Committee (President-Elect @olivermb, @walidadelafifi, @mjdutt, @catchatweetdown, @DrSrivi, and @msand37) #ICA21: https://t.co/WlOWGvGTok
